definition: (literary) to die by hanging or strangulation

sentences.english: He hanged himself in sorrow after his wife died.
sentences.chinese: 妻子死後，他因悲傷而自縊。

sentences.english: After the failure of innovation, thanks to its hanging empress.
sentences.chinese: 革新失敗後，慈禧賜其自縊。

sentences.english: Megan hanged herself that same afternoon in her bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 當天下午，米根在臥室自縊而死。

sentences.english: She apparently hanged herself with a rope made of medical bandages.
sentences.chinese: 跡象表明她顯然是用醫療繃帶製成的繩子自縊而亡。

sentences.english: Without any other choice, Yang hangs herself on a pear tree.
sentences.chinese: 無奈之下，楊貴妃自縊於梨花樹下。

sentences.english: The man living next door hanged himself in sorrow after his wife died.
sentences.chinese: 住在隔壁的那個男人失去妻子後，悲痛的自縊而亡。

sentences.english: Objective: to probe into the changes of nurses in psychiatric department after experienced a case underwent self-hanging.
sentences.chinese: 探討病人自縊後精神科護士情緒的變化。

definition: to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
to die tragically/to meet with a violent death
to fall off or jump off a building
to denounce/to condemn/to call to account/to punish
